description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国青海省省会，位于青海省东部，是青藏高原第一大城市。
description.en: The capital of Qinghai Province, People's Republic of China, located in the eastern part of Qinghai Province, it is the largest city on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党西宁市委员会书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Secretary of the Xining Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任西宁市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Director of the Standing Committee of the Xining Municipal People's Congress.

birth_place.zh-cn: 青海省化隆回族自治县

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任西宁市人民政府市长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Mayor of the Xining Municipal People's Government.

birth_place.zh-cn: 甘肃省天祝藏族自治县

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议西宁市委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Chairman of the Xining Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

nodes.id: 中国共产党西宁市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党西宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在西宁市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Xining City.

nodes.id: 西宁市人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 西宁市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 西宁市的国家权力机关。
description.en: The organ of state power in Xining City.

description.zh-cn: 西宁市的国家行政机关。
description.en: The state administrative organ of Xining City.

nodes.id: 中国人民政治协商会议西宁市委员会

zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议西宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议在西宁市的地方组织。
description.en: The local organization of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference in Xining City.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代王朝。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期的政权之一。
description.en: One of the states during the Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国十六国时期的政权之一。
description.en: One of the states during the Sixteen Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北方王朝。
description.en: A northern dynasty during the Northern and Southern dynasties period of China.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝第二位皇帝。
description.en: The second emperor of the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代王朝。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝于8世纪中期发生的一场大规模叛乱，是唐朝由盛转衰的转折点。
description.en: A massive rebellion in the mid-8th century against the Tang dynasty, marking a turning point from prosperity to decline.

description.zh-cn: 存在于7至9世纪的藏族政权。
description.en: A Tibetan political entity that existed from the 7th to the 9th century.

description.zh-cn: 11世纪初期青海河湟地区吐蕃部落集团首领之一。
description.en: One of the leaders of a Tibetan tribal confederation in the Huangshui River Valley region of Qinghai in the early 11th century.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃赞普的后代，曾被李立遵劫持为名义上的领袖。
description.en: A descendant of the Tibetan emperor (Tsenpo), who was once held by Li Lizun as a nominal leader.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代王朝。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由女真族建立的北方王朝。
description.en: A northern dynasty in Chinese history established by the Jurchen people.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上由党项族建立的王朝。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history established by the Tangut people.

description.zh-cn: 蒙古帝国奠基者、世界史上杰出的政治家、军事家。
description.en: Founder of the Mongol Empire, an outstanding statesman and military strategist in world history.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代王朝。
description.en: An ancient Chinese dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 明朝及清初在西宁地区设立的军事及行政机构。
description.en: A military and administrative institution established in the Xining area during the Ming and early Qing dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 明朝设立的军事指挥机构，管辖范围包括今陕西、甘肃、宁夏、青海部分地区。
description.en: A military command institution established during the Ming dynasty, with jurisdiction over parts of modern-day Shaanxi, Gansu, Ningxia, and Qinghai.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上最后一个大一统封建王朝。
description.en: The last imperial dynasty in Chinese history.

description.zh-cn: 清代青海和硕特蒙古首领，曾发动反清叛乱。
description.en: A leader of the Khoshut Mongols in Qinghai during the Qing dynasty, who launched a rebellion against the Qing.

description.zh-cn: 清朝在西宁设立的行政机构。
description.en: An administrative institution established in Xining during the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期的甘肃省行政建制。
description.en: The administrative division of Gansu Province during the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国训政时期的中央政府与最高行政机关。
description.en: The central government and highest administrative body of the Republic of China during the Tutelage Period.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期设立的省级行政区。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region established during the Republic of China era.

relationships.target: 中国共产党西宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 王卫东自2023年4月起担任中国共产党西宁市委员会书记。
description.en: Wang Weidong has served as the Secretary of the Xining Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China since April 2023.

relationships.target: 西宁市人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 黄城自2024年11月起担任西宁市人民代表大会常务委员会主任。
description.en: Huang Cheng has served as the Director of the Standing Committee of the Xining Municipal People's Congress since November 2024.

description.zh-cn: 石建平自2023年2月起担任西宁市人民政府市长。
description.en: Shi Jianping has served as the Mayor of the Xining Municipal People's Government since February 2023.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议西宁市委员会

description.zh-cn: 洛珠南杰自2024年11月起担任中国人民政治协商会议西宁市委员会主席。
description.en: Luozhu Nanjie has served as the Chairman of the Xining Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference since November 2024.

description.zh-cn: 西汉在今西宁设立西平亭，是西宁建城之始，并将其正式纳入中国版图。
description.en: The Western Han Dynasty established Xipingting in present-day Xining, which marked the beginning of the city's construction and its formal incorporation into the territory of China.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏于222年在今西宁市修筑了西平郡城。
description.en: In 222, Cao Wei constructed the Xiping Commandery city in present-day Xining.

description.zh-cn: 十六国时期的南凉政权曾一度建都于西宁（时称西平）。
description.en: The Southern Liang regime during the Sixteen Kingdoms period once established its capital in Xining (then called Xiping).

description.zh-cn: 北魏于526年将此地改置为鄯州。
description.en: In 526, the Northern Wei dynasty re-established this area as Shanzhou.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝于大业三年（607年）将鄯州改为西平郡，西宁为其辖地。
description.en: In the third year of the Daye era (607), Emperor Yang of Sui changed Shanzhou to Xiping Commandery, with Xining under its jurisdiction.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱导致唐朝国力衰退，为吐蕃从唐军手中夺取西宁提供了机会。
description.en: The An Lushan Rebellion weakened the Tang Dynasty, providing an opportunity for the Tibetan Empire to seize Xining from the Tang army.

description.zh-cn: 安史之乱后，吐蕃从唐军手中夺取了对西宁的控制权。
description.en: After the An Lushan Rebellion, the Tibetan Empire seized control of Xining from the Tang army.

description.zh-cn: 吐蕃占领西宁后，将其改称为青唐城。
description.en: After occupying Xining, the Tibetan Empire renamed it Qingtangcheng.

description.zh-cn: 将吐蕃赞普的后代唃厮啰劫持并尊为名义上的赞普，自己则自立为相进行控制。
description.en: He abducted Gusiluo, a descendant of the Tibetan emperor, and installed him as a nominal Tsenpo, while making himself regent to control him.

description.zh-cn: 北宋于1104年将鄯州改为西宁州，“西宁”这一名称自此开始并沿用至今。
description.en: In 1104, the Northern Song dynasty changed Shanzhou to Xiningzhou, and the name "Xining" has been used ever since.

description.zh-cn: 金朝于1129年占领了原属北宋的西宁州。
description.en: In 1129, the Jin dynasty occupied Xiningzhou, which had previously belonged to the Northern Song.

description.zh-cn: 西夏于1136年占领了原属金朝的西宁州。
description.en: In 1136, the Western Xia occupied Xiningzhou, which had previously belonged to the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 成吉思汗于1227年率蒙古军队攻占西宁州，结束了西夏对此地的统治。
description.en: In 1227, Genghis Khan led the Mongol army to capture Xiningzhou, ending the rule of the Western Xia over the area.

description.zh-cn: 明朝于洪武六年（1373年）将西宁州改为西宁卫。
description.en: In the sixth year of the Hongwu era (1373), the Ming dynasty changed Xiningzhou to the Xining Guard.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期，西宁卫属陕西行都司管辖。
description.en: During the Ming dynasty, the Xining Guard was under the jurisdiction of the Shaanxi Regional Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 清朝于雍正三年（1725年）平定了罗卜藏丹津的反清叛乱。
description.en: In the third year of the Yongzheng era (1725), the Qing dynasty suppressed the anti-Qing rebellion of Lobsang Danjin.

description.zh-cn: 平定罗卜藏丹津叛乱后，清朝改西宁卫为西宁府。
description.en: After suppressing the Lobsang Danjin rebellion, the Qing dynasty changed the Xining Guard to Xining Prefecture.

description.zh-cn: 清朝时期，西宁府属甘肃省管辖。
description.en: During the Qing dynasty, Xining Prefecture was under the jurisdiction of Gansu Province.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府于1929年设立青海省。
description.en: The Nationalist Government established Qinghai Province in 1929.

description.zh-cn: 于1946年6月正式成立西宁市。
description.en: Formally established Xining City in June 1946.
